definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: This paper introduces a frequency direction-based multiresolution image fusion method.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種基於頻帶方向的多分辨率圖像融合方法。

sentences.english: By Neyman-Pearson rule, simulation of signal detection when frequency is unknown but frequency range is known was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 對已知頻帶內未知頻率信號的檢測性能進行了仿真。

sentences.english: Approximation and recovery of band-limited functions from shift-invariant operators is studied.
sentences.chinese: 給出了有限頻帶函數利用平移不變算子的逼近與恢復。

sentences.english: We use the term bandwidth to represent such a frequency range.
sentences.chinese: 我們用頻帶寬度這個詞來代表這樣的頻率範圍。

sentences.english: They are two bands when seperate and one whole band when thery're altogether.
sentences.chinese: 他們是兩個頻帶時，分離和一整個樂隊，他們共。

sentences.english: The bandwidth was reduced by two-thirds.
sentences.chinese: 頻帶寬度減少了三分之二。

sentences.english: The limitation of over wide-band passive radar seeker is pointed.
sentences.chinese: 指出了超寬頻帶被動雷達導引頭的侷限性。

sentences.english: Selecting the bands where the failure located recomposed the signal and diagnosed the failure.
sentences.chinese: 選擇故障所處頻帶重構信號，對故障進行診斷。

sentences.english: Multiple groups of bandsenable multiple modes of operation for MultiBand OFDM devices.
sentences.chinese: 多組頻帶使得多頻帶OFDM設備可以多模式操作。

sentences.english: Multiple groups of bandsenable multiple modes of operation for MultiBand OFDM devices.
sentences.chinese: 多組頻帶使得多頻帶OFDM設備可以多模式操作。

sentences.english: Exploit differences in technologies and frequency bands.
sentences.chinese: 發掘各種技術和頻帶之間的差別。

sentences.english: The influence of multi-band interference on ultra-wideband (UWB) communication is analyzed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了多頻帶干擾對超寬帶調製技術性能的影響。

sentences.english: Royalty-free Sample Loops and free Band publicity.
sentences.chinese: 無皇室樣本迴路和自由的頻帶公開。

sentences.english: They had borrowed rolls of these bands.
sentences.chinese: 他們借來的萬卷這些頻帶。

sentences.english: Sub-band coding is a means to accomplish bandwidth compression of HDTV signals.
sentences.chinese: 子帶編碼是實現高清晰度電視頻帶壓縮的一種方法。

sentences.english: Novel dual-band retro-directive antenna arrays are proposed in this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 本論文提出雙頻帶信號回溯系統之創新設計。

pinyin: guo2 ji4 dian4 xin4 lian2 meng2

definition: summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
set-top box/decoder for digital or satellite TV signal etc
